basic_information.scholarship_name: Drs. Charles A. & Louise Rickman Scholarship

description: The Drs. Charles A. & Louise Rickman Scholarship is open to students who have declared a major in Management, Human Resource Management, or PGA Golf Management major. Eligibility Requirements Declared major in Management, Human Resource Management, or PGA Golf Management major Must have at least one semester completed at UCO Oklahoma resident and have a cumulative retention GPA in the upper 60% in the designated major Illustrating financial need through the EFC (Expected Family Contribution) number Enrolled full-time (throughout the application and award semesters) Minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75 or higher Demonstrate financial need by writing and essay detailing financial need If student is a senior they must be enrolled in both Fall and Spring undergraduate courses and not be eligible to apply for graduation during the time of awards. Selection Process Preference to be given to students who graduated from high school while a resident of Baptist Children's Home - OKC, Boys' Ranch Town - Edmond, Baptist Children's Home - Owasso, or the Baptist Home for Girls - Madill The student must have completed a personal finance course or successfully complete a personal finance course in the first semester eligible to enroll in the course (withdrawal from the course results in forfeiture of the scholarship) Must provide a current resume, biographical sketch, copy of most recent transcript, and detailed explanation of financial need this information along with copy of the current semester class enrollment will be provided to the donors within the first four weeks of the fall semester
